transArray.content: The hotel is close to the subway station, and the breakfast time is quite long and rich. Free oranges are provided in the front lobby every day, and the service is also very goodüëç

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and recommending our service attitude and breakfast. The hotel provides a rich and varied buffet breakfast for free to guests staying with breakfast from 7 am to 10 am every day. There is ample dining time to satisfy you. catering to your dining needs at different times. The hotel is located diagonally opposite Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on West Fourth Ring Subway Line 6. It only takes a five-minute walk from Exit A. The parking spaces shared with the Badley Automobile Park are abundant and convenient. , is your best choice for business trips. Your affirmation is the greatest encouragement for our work. We look forward to meeting you again. I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
